description: Traditional restaurants are trying to find ways of staying in business in a second wave of Covid-19.
title: Coronavirus: Italians find new ways to eat out
title_page: Coronavirus: Italians find new ways to eat out - BBC News
maintext: "We didn't want to double our prices because it wouldn't have been fair on our clients: to suddenly find the same dish at twice the price because we'd halved the number of covers. So we found an idea that would allow our business to remain open."
